choices: Catwoman - Selina Kyle Storyline
Wonder Woman -
Other -
Harley's Storyline
Injustice 2 : Storylines
1.content:
An attempt to salvage / redo the old injustice Slobs among us story Red Circles had on the go

Injustice 1 : DC:U Heroes are pitted against each other to stop Superman's regime

Injustice 2 : Picking up after the first game, the regime has since been defeated but a new threat in the form of brainiac forces old foes to become allies once more

This Story : The events that kicked off Injustice 1 have sent the female cast of both games hurtling into an alternate universe, where big fat slobs are the norm.

What will happen to our heroes!?
1.title: Restructure_New Start

choices: She falls and lands in the middle of a slob eating contest
She keeps going till she finds a obese slobby Harley
She gets caught by some kind of slob patrol
4th option - New plotline
5th option - New plotline
11.content:
(big thanks to RockySavannah, who has been kind enough to share his archive of the OG version)


Selina Kyle woke up with her head pounding like she'd been on the receiving end of a train wreck, the last she remembered her and Wonder women had been fighting when suddenly a bright white light had appeared, the next thing she knew her she was, lying in what appeared to be a dumpster with her head ringing. dragging herself out of the flithy trash container she got to her feet and gave herself a quick once over, her catsuit was still in one piece, she didn't seem to be hurt or injured in anyway and wonder woman was nowhere to be found, all in all she'd somehow managed to make a quick (albeit not very clean) getaway.

quickly jumping up to the roofs of the alleyway she'd woken up in she bounded along to try and meet up with Harley Quinn at their rendezvous point, however she was soon distracted by the sights of the city she was in, visually and architecturally it looked like metropolis, however the residents had definitely changed, the entire population that was was walking along the streets beneath her all appeared to be over 300 pounds and enjoying it, with most of them stuffing their faces and not caring about the messes they where making of themselves or the city.

she hurried on, bounding from roof top to roof top, mind racing at what strange place she'd somehow managed to find herself in
11.title: Catwoman - Selina Kyle Storyline

choices: Selina is forcefed with a pumptube full of garbage slop!
Selina has to live with a slobby version of Wonder Woman!
Selina has to gain 100 pounds within a day, or live in prison for life!
113.content:
(originally by RedCircles)

"Freeze!"



A spotlight caught her as she found herself against a wall. Nearly blinded, she looked through and saw a car, along with two women in officer uniforms. One was an incredibly obese blonde woman, looking over 400 pounds easily and barely fitting into her suit, which was stained with ketchup and mustard droppings. The other was an Asian woman, who wasn't obese but had incredibly large breasts. The blonde pointed a gun at her.



"Make one move and you'll be in trouble! URRRRRP!"



Selina was very confused by the situation, but made a leap of faith to her left. Unfortunately, the woman's gun was too quick for her, as it shot out some sort of handcuff device, immediately attaching itself to Selina's hands, causing her to stumble a bit. The officers quickly went in and apprehended her. The Asian woman took out some sort of scanning device and scanned Selina up and down. She looked at the results and gasped.



"135 pounds!" she said, shaking her head, "Looks like we have someone about to pull some diet scams, Wendy,"



"I thought we got rid of you thugs!" the blonde growled, "Criminals like you just want to ruin our livelihoods!"



"What did I do? Let me go!" Selina shouted.



"You should know better, punk. You have to weigh a minimum of 200 pounds to live in Slobtropolis,"



The Asian officer burped loudly into Selina's face, causing her to cough from the belchy stench.



"Well Wendy, you know the punishment options," she said, "What do we do to her?"
113.title: She gets caught by some kind of slob patrol

choices: The Garbage slop has wrecked havoc with her digestive system
She Passes out from the shock of it all, wakes up in a diner
??? New path
1131.content:
"we'll do a Code 45c, but make it quick though, i wanna get back to the station in time for doughnuts" The blonde Belched out, rubbing her stomach whistfully at the thought of the doughy treats waiting back at their station



"what the heck's a 45c" Selina wondered to herself as Asian officer waddled off to the car, her answers weren't exactly made clear when she returned with a giant tube that seemed to be trailing from the cop cars trunk,



"open wide"



Selina didn't even have time to resist, a shock on the handcuffs caused her to open her mouth in surprise as the fat asian officer shoved the pump into her mouth



"Turn it on Wendy" She shouted back "let's get this going, you know what jenny's like, if we're late we'll be lucky if theres even crumbs lying around"



Suddenly Selina found herself fighting the urge to wretch as something absoloutely vile started flowing from the pipe down her open throat, the slimy texture lubricating her open gullet making the rest of it flow down that much easier, shifting around from where she was stuck on the ground Selina saw what was being pumped into her, from the trunk of the cop car there was a gigantic vat of what looked to be liquid garbage, a thick grey viscous substance that didn't seem to be ending any time soon, a tightness in her stomach brought her attention back to her more immediate problem though as she looked down to see her stomach bulging out and pressing against her catsuit, causing the tight material to stretch uncomfortably against her, but with her hands cuffed and her mouth stuffed she couldn't fight back against what was happening, in fact it was over before she realised as she heard the Blonde yell out from looking at the scanner device "and that's 205, she's back on the limit, ticket her and let's get out of here" she said as she pressed a button the vat and the tube reeled itself back into the trunk of their car



the cuffs where off with a click and a slip of paper was shoved into her hands,



"that's your first warning, if we catch you again and you've gone back underweight the consequences will be much more severe" The asian officer belched in her face before turning around and giving her a face full of gas as she waddled back into the car with her partner and sped off.



in the space of about 10 minutes Selina had gone from slim and petite into stuffed, bloated and fat, her cat suit had somehow managed to stay on, with most of the new weight still being centered in her fat bulging belly, it not having had a chance to digest yet, much like Selina, who still wasn't quite sure what had just happened as she struggled to her feet, feeling heavier and sluggish as she did so
1131.title: Selina is forcefed with a pumptube full of garb...

choices: She stays to eat, ends up pigging out there all day
She leaves, decides to investigate the town further.
11312.content:
Selina opened her eyes, dazed and dizzy from what just happened. She felt her stomach, as it still felt bloated full of the garbage goop. She sat up, finding herself at a table, looking around and finding herself in what looked like a diner. It smelled of flatulence and burgergrease, as she tried to figure out what happened. She rested her bloated belly against the table as an obese waitress approached her. The waitress had long brunette hair and a uniform stained with grease and condiments.



"You okay, honey?" she said, "I found you passed out earlier in the alley. I mean, I usually find women passed out there all the time but you looked in bad shape..."



Selina didn't want to say what happened, worried about dealing with another backlash in an unfamiliar world.



"Y..yeah, I uh, got really tired..."



"Yeah, you don't look good. Tell you what, URRRRP!, I'll offer you free meals just for today. You do look mighty hungry,"



Selina didn't want to eat, but despite her pumped stomach, it growled loudly, even causing the waitress to laugh.



"See? I can tell you're starving. Here's a menu,"



Selina was surprised as what looked like a phone book was plopped in front of her.



"...This is your whole menu?" she asked.



"Oh no, I can show you the whole one if you want..."



"I uh, think this is fine, thanks,"



"Okay, just burp if you need me!"



The waitress waddled off, farting away and leaving Selina to deal with the gassy fumes. She looked through the large menu, and all she saw looked very unhealthy. Steaks covered in extra grease, triple burgers with bacon and cheese, shakes made out of hot dogs and ice cream, and so on.



"Sheesh, wouldn't a diet bar be enough of me," she thought. She wanted to leave immediately and find out what was going on. But she was also pretty hungry, and wouldn't mind a meal....
11312.title: She Passes out from the shock of it all, wakes ...

choices: Selina orders a large meal
Skip to after Selina's meal, the food's making her gain at an abnormal rate.
113121.content:
Noticing how busy the waitress was, Selina tried her best to burp loudly, pressing deeply into her now doughy middle.



"Errp!"



The belch was like a mouse's squeak but somehow the waitress heard it, waddling over and plopping down a large cola.



"Try this first."



Selina nodded, sipping a bit but the waitress just shook her head and pushed upwards on the bottom of the cup, Selina forced to gulp the stuff down, emptying the entire cup in one fell swoop.



Selina felt her stomach churn as she placed the cup down, opening her mouth to thank the waitress. "BURRRAAAAAPP!"



The waitress grinned and pressed deeply into Selina's middle, eliciting another belch. "That's the spirit, stick."
113121.title: She stays to eat, ends up pigging out there all...

choices: She comes across a ladies dance club, entering to see if she can get answers
She comes across someone she knows!... Or does she?....
1131211.content:
"Well, I am kinda... lost in this menu," Selina said, "Tell you what, how about just anything you think would be good?"



The waitress smiled as she took the menu.



"I'll be back, hun," she said.



Twenty minutes later, she came back with trays of hot, greasy food! There seem to be dozens of different burgers, a plate full of baconstrips, a large barrel of mixed soda and slop, cheesesteaks, a mountain of sloppy pancakes, and more types of food than the eye could see! Selina licked her lips at the large display.



"Dig in, hun!" the waitress said as she walked off.



Selina went like a wild cat into the food. She had never felt this hungry before, even with her stomach pumped with slop. Which speaking of, was only growing and growing as Selina scarfed her way through. Her fleshy belly grew like a beanbag as it rested itself on the table.



It took nearly two hours for Selina to finish but she felt satisfied. As she gulped down a cup of syrup to finish it off, she burped off loudly, but a bit embarrassed. How was she so piggish after such a short time? Not only that, she must've gained about 70 extra pounds in the short timespan. Selina enjoyed it all, but had to find out what was going on.



"Thank you miss, but I must head out now,"



The waitress farted back in happiness.



Selina walked out to the city streets, and somehow, her stomach was still growling with hunger!
1131211.title: Selina orders a large meal

choices: Selina tells her the truth. Killer Frost smirks and takes her to Harley Quinn
A confused, skinny, Hawkgirl interrupts the two.
11312111.content:
Selina winced a bit at the loud dance music that assaulted her ears as she entered the club, making her way through the mass of fat to obese slobs, men and women alike looking at Selina with pity in their eyes.



It was just after Selina had made it through a particularly large mass of people that she spotted someone familiar, or at least partially.



It was Killer Frost, dressed in little more than a thong and bra, the rest of her body oozing out of the tiny fabric. Selina went bug eyed at the mass of fat that her compatriot had put on.



"Frost, they got you too!"



The cold-themed villianess narrowed her eyes at Selina.



"No, you're not Selina. You look like her, but you're a twig. Besides, Diana would kill you if she caught you in here. Who are you and where did you come from?!"



A cold hand landed on her shoulder then, Killer Frost's breath reaching Selina's nose, the thief gagging at the horrid stench.



"Answer me!"
11312111.title: She comes across a ladies dance club, entering ...

choices: They finish eating, as Selina is even bigger and Hawkgirl gains a bigger belly
The fat Killer Frost finds them in the diner!
113121112.content:
"Hey, knock it off!" a familiar voice said as she pushed Frost off. To Selina's surprise, it was Hawkgirl, the Hawkgirl she knew anyways! The crowd gasped as they saw the fit Hawkgirl.



"It's a stick!" Frost shrieked, "Someone call the police!"



"Hawkgirl, get us outta here!" Selina burped.



"Are-are you...?"



"No time for questions! We gotta get out now!"



Hawkgirl nodded as she grabbed Selina, then spread her wings and flew through the club. They managed to get their way through the crowd of obese citizens, as they quickly ran off from the chaos before the cops came. Selina told her to go to the diner, as they quickly entered and sat at a table. The waitress came back, giving a shocked look at Hawkgirl.



"Miss, please, she's not from around her!" Selina said, "Please don't notify the police!"



The waitress was stunned, but laughed and gave a hefty fart.



"Hey, you've been a good customer, I'll let it slide!"



She walked off, as a confused Hakwgirl looked over Selina.



"Okay, I usually wouldn't give you the time of day, but I gotta understand what this place is," Hawkgirl said.



Selina explained to Hawkgirl what she'd been through and what the city was like.



"Huh.... I guess something caused a dimensional shift during our battle," Hawkgirl said, "Although the circumstances are irrelevant I guess, we need to find a place out of here first,"



Selina belched at Hawkgirl raised an eyebrow.



"...You're my dimension's Selina, right?"



"What do you mean?"



"Well, I found out there's an obese version of me around here. So I guess there's an obese version of all of us here. Maybe if we can get one of them to understand, we can get help out of here,"



Selina was stunned. Was there a possibly even bigger version of herself here? Her thoughts were interrupted by her stomach growling.



"Mroow, this kitty's hungry again," she whined. Hakwgirl's stomach growled a bit, too.



"...Yeah, I need something to eat too. Even though some of the food grosses me out here..."



URRRRRRPPPP! Selina burped loudly to get more food from the waitress.
113121112.title: A confused, skinny, Hawkgirl interrupts the two.

choices: Selina convinces Harley to help her. Harley takes her to the Watchtower.
Killer Frost defeats Hawkgirl and takes her to her lair to slob up.
1131211122.content:
Selina had barely taken a bite out of her extra large burger when she felt cold, heralding the sudden ice spike that splintered their table in two.



Killer Frost had found them.



Selina got to her feet as fast as she can, ready to fight back, but was blocked by Hawkgirl.



"You're in no condition to fight. Get out of here, I'll hold her off!"



The obese Frost let loose a wintry fart, some snowflakes fluttering from her butt. "Yeah right, stick."



"Just go!" the heroine roared, pushing Selina away. The thief nodded and got out of there, a few small farts escaping her rear as she darted outside.



She heard Hawkgirl roar and the sound of her mace hitting something but then she got out of earshot of the diner, running for all she was worth.



Ducking into an alley, Selina stopped to catch her breath.



"Well, well, you're looking small these days, Kitty."



Selina turned towards the source of the voice, gaping at the sheer enormity that was Harley Quinn.
1131211122.title: The fat Killer Frost finds them in the diner!

choices: Selina wants to try to find the others
Selina just wants to try to get back home
11312111221.content:
Harley noticed something was quite off about Selina. She took out an old piece of bacon from her pocket, and waved it in front of Selina. Selina just looked at it, as Harley sighed.



"Okay, you're not the Selina I know, cause otherwise you would've ripped that out of my hand in an instant," Harley said as she bit into the bacon.



"It's a long story, Harley, but let's just say I'm not of this world,"



"Well, I've seen weirder things around here," Harley said as she chewed the bacon loudly, gnashing crumbs everywhere, "But why are you here?"



"I don't know, but I have to get out of here. Do you know of anything that can help?"



"Come with me," Harley said.



The two made their way to the Watchtower (And stopping for some fast food in the meanwhile) as they entered the large tower. Harley led Selina into a room filled with computers and gadgets, as she sat at one computer.



"VERIFICATION NEEDED" it said, as Harley burped into the screen. "WELCOME, HARLEY," it said. Harley grabbed an attachment and scanned Selina with it, as data popped up on the screen.



"This machine detects alien life," she said, "It's telling me that other than you, five other people of your kind are wandering this area,"



"Five?" Selina asked. She remembered the five other fighters in the brawl, - Hawkgirl, Frost, Wonder Woman, Raven, and Harley - she knew Hawkgirl was here, the others were too?



"Yeah, though it can't tell me where they are," Harley replied.



Selina usually didn't care, though she was getting a bit worried about Hawkgirl...
11312111221.title: Selina convinces Harley to help her. Harley tak...

choices: :Harley summons all the slobby Justice League.
Meanwhile, Frost and her lover are having fun making Hawkgirl slobby.
113121112211.content:
"Hawkgirl was battling your Killer Frost buying me time to get away."



Harley shivered a bit at the mention frost, letting loose a moist fart that had Selina coughing. "Frost's a kinky one. This one time, she captured Wonder Woman and nearly made her immobile. Her girlfriend was so pissed she nearly went full demon on Frost."



"Well can you help Hawkgirl or not?"



"Just a minute," Harley replied, soon getting an image of the diner Selina had escaped from.



There was no sign of Hawkgirl or Frost, but clear indications that they'd had a fight.



Typing in more data, Harley brought up a map of the globe, a blue dot blinking for a few moments before vanishing.



"Damn it, that cold jerk's onto us! Last reading I get is in Slobtham City."



"Well let's go!"



"Not so fast. Slobtham's dangerous, mostly villains."



"What about Batman?"



"He's Coast Slobity's hero. There is no hero for Slobtham, though we've tried to take it back. Joker and his thugs, along with psychos like Frost, rule the place. No, we're gonna need more help."
113121112211.title: Selina wants to try to find the others

choices: :They manage to get in, but Hakwgirl has been stuffed up!
They think Selina is too weak, and encourage her to quickly gain
1131211122111.content:
Harley managed to gather what she could of the current Justice League. Before her and Selina stood Wonder Woman, Catwoman, Hawkgirl and Raven. Diana and Selina were both incredibly obese, while Hawkgirl and Raven were chubby, but also very unhygienic. The fat Selina gave an odd look towards the thinner one.



"Harley, I appreciate the fans, but please don't bring cosplayers into the HQ," she said.



"Err, I don't know how to tell you all this, but this is an alien version of Selina,"



The group were confused, but Selina explained the story. The group were shocked to hear the story.



"Slobtham's very dangerous," said Hawkgirl, "But we gotta save Hawkgirl... ummm, the thin Hawkgirl, I mean!"



"We'll have to all work together," Raven added, "Everyone to the transporter, we're going to Slobtham!"



Diana gave a sly slime, as she grabbed both Selinas.



"Is this my first mission with two girlfriends?" she said.



Selina thought about it for a second.



"Wait, you and me... um, you and her.... really??.."



The fat Selina purred.



"Why not? I've always wanted to play with myself..."



Selina turned bright red as the three were led out to Slobtham.
1131211122111.title: :Harley summons all the slobby Justice League.

choices: Hawkgirl wasn't forcefed. She was infected and Selina's got it too.
Raven asks Diana and Selina's help for hooking up with the slobby Hawkgirl.
11312111221111.content:
The slobby heroes and Selina soon busted down the walls of Frost's lair, a very obvious Artic Slob building, finding Frost gone and nothing in the lair except some computers, a few fridges, and Hawkgirl.



But Frost had obviously ruined what slim figure the winged hero had once had, the mace wielder now looking nearly a match for her slobby duplicate, the main difference being in how the weight was distributed.



The slobby Hawkgirl had a chubby face, a wide rear, and massive thighs. Her duplicate, on the other hand, had a pancake face, a gut that was nearly touching the floor, and obese wings.



The chubby Selina helped get Hawkgirl to her feet while the slobby one looked on, nudging Diana.



"She's a big softie underneath all that anti-hero facade, just like me!"



"Well you're just soft all over, honey," Diana teased.



"You know you love it."



Diana simply nodded and soon enough the heroes were back at the Watchtower thanks to Raven's portal abilities.
11312111221111.title: :They manage to get in, but Hakwgirl has been s...

choices: Wonder Woman and Raven
Killer Frost and Harley Quinn
113121112211111.content:
As Selina sat with a resting Hawkgirl alongside fat Selina and Diana, she was surprised by some of Hawkgirl's answers.



"Wait, they didn't torture you?" she said.



"Well, um, not really," Hawk replied, "They did defeat and capture me, but then I got really hungry and saw the fridge. So I broke loose and starting eating everything up. They couldn't stop me so they gave up and ran off,"



"it seems like our atmosphere got to her," Diana said, "I'm guessing if you're here long enough you start becoming slobby,"



Selina gasped.



"So, me too?"



"Probably. If you're not back home soon, these feelings might be permanent,"



Selina felt worried, as Raven ran into the room.



"Selina! We got radar of two women from your dimension,"



Selina gasped.



"We've got confirmation of--"
113121112211111.title: Hawkgirl wasn't forcefed. She was infected ...

choices: Diana and Raven think Selina's a threat and fight her
They invite Selina to eat with them. The three gain weight.
1131211122111111.content:
"Wonder Woman and myself," Raven reported.



The monitor showed the slim Wonder Woman and Raven eating at a buffet, the obese Diana chuckling at how Wonder Woman's eyes widened at the size of the meal she'd gotten for herself.



"Looks like it's already effecting them," Raven said. "This is too weird."



"Send me down there," Selina said.



"Alright, but won't you need help?"



"No, I'll be okay. Just be sure to teleport the three of us up here if I start to lose control."



"Understood," obese Selina said, cuddling on Diana's lap as the tubby hero sat down.



A flash of light later, Selina was in the buffet, walking towards her two gorging associates.
1131211122111111.title: Wonder Woman and Raven

choices: Selina want's to find her fat counterpart to ask her some questions
This universes Zatanna wobbles in, she keeps fattening and slobbing them up
11312111221111112.content:
As Selina walked up to the two she began smelling the diner they where in, unlike the last one she'd been which just stank of flatulence and grease, this one seemed to be pumping in an appetizing smell of bacon fat, Grilled pork and all other kinds of tasty meat smells, she could see why Diana and Raven had started gorging themselves so quickly, this place was almost passable as hygienic.



"Oh hey Selina, you're here too, grab a seat" Diana said, catching sight of Selina and breaking her from her train of thought, Selina slid into the booth, sitting next to Raven, the grey skinned heroine barely acknowledging her, too content and focused on stuffing her face with the greasy food already in front of her.



"Diana, listen, we're in some kind of" Selina began to explain before being cut off by a chubby waitress



"what'll you be having miss"



"what? i'm not here to..."



"she'll have the same as we had thanks, the Meaty Wonder Platter, heavy on the grease and sauce, thanks" Diana quickly cut in front of her



"what'd you say that for" Selina whispered at Diana as she the waitress waddled off



"because, it's obvious we're in some kind of alternate dimension where slovenly obesity is the enforced lifestyle, we don't want to draw too much attention to ourselves so we came in here to stuff ourselves up and keep incognito while we try and figure out what's going on" Diana replied, munching on a large steak she had been toying with for quite a while



"That's!! that's actually pretty much what i was going to say...." Selina replied, somewhat down about having her exposition thunder stolen from her "but anyway, we've got to got out of here, this universes justice league is going to help us, we've got hawkgirl back in their watch tower, all we have to do is grab the others and we can head back home"



Raven let out a giant belch at this point, rubbing her distended stomach before diving back into the food in front of her with added enthusiasm, making a show of herself and eating away loudly



"So, you left hawkgirl by herself with the heroes of the universe where being fat and gassy is considered the norm, and you think they're going to help us get back to our universe?" Diana whispered



"what do you mean" Selina looked quite worried at what Diana was implying, the sounds of Raven eating and belching getting louder still



"If we don't have dimension transport technology why would this version of ourselves have it, better still, why would they use it to send us back, don't you remember the justice lords"



"they aren't like that, they're just fatter versions of us" at this point Selina's food had arrived, she picked up a pork chop and began to eat it, her stomach rumbling



"oh yeah, that's why they allow cops to go around fattening up anyone underweight, you're looking a lot chunkier then when we last met, more than 200 i might add" it was at this Selina realised just how much fatter she'd become, she'd long since passed the minimum weight she'd been forced to, now a good 300 pounds overweight, she was amazed her catsuit was even still holding, but noticed it was now only acting as a makeshift bra and leggings, her belly having burst through it pounds ago, her food stained stomach bulging forwards and rumbling for more food



"they've been keeping you nice and stuffed i see then" Diana finished, eating the food in front of her, the 3 eating in relative silence as Selina thought about what Diana was implying, she had asked to be warped out of the diner if she'd lost control, she was eating quite a bit more than she would deem "in control", the 3 of them where beginning to plump up a little bit more with each bite of the strange food they forced into their mouths



eventually Selina spoke up again



"I don't think they've been fattening me up on purpose but you do have a point, something isn't right with this, it's all just been going so fast since i got hit by one of their patrols, i didn't even notice how fat i've gotten" She whispered back to Diana, farting as she did to cover their talk from any prying ears



"gassy too" Raven quickly butted in



"yes, thanks Raven, i would never of noticed otherwise" Selina growled back



they where all nearly finished with their meals now, Selina still the fattest of the group but Wonder Women and Raven now bulging past the 200 pounds they needed to not get stopped on the streets, Diana mostly having her weight in her belly and breasts which spilled out ahead of her chunky body, while Raven found her weight spreading all over her evenly, they rose from the booth, bodies jiggling as they did so



"So," began Diana "what'll we do now"
11312111221111112.title: They invite Selina to eat with them. The three ...

choices: "because, you're about to join us" Lois Lane The Mad Fattener enters the room"
"because, I want to be the new fat queen" Selina asks them for their help
113121112211111121.content:
"i'm going to have a good hard talk with myself" Selina said outloud



"well that's very introspective of you but i don't see how it helps" wonder woman said to her as the three of them where teleported out of the diner into the justice leagues base again, the two Ravens having a chance to meet while Diana realised what had just happened, hurring off after Selina who was waddling off in a huffy pace to find her universes counterpart



the two of them eventually found Slob Selina in her quarters, drinking milk out of a giant cat bowl



"oh hey me, you've found Diana i see then" She burped out in mild indifference



"don't give me that, we're going to have a little chat" her "thin" self barked back at her, fully aware the differences in their sizes was beginning to become less and less



"how did this universe get so fat, you can't of always been this fat, you couldn't of gotten to this point in human evolution with everyone being this size, nor would you need slob police to fatten up underweight people" Slob Selina looked rather uncomfortable with the question, but motioned at Diana to close the door so she could explain herself



"well, UURRRP, it all started 5 years ago really, you all said you were transported here after a huge battle right? well we had the same battle, the only difference being our universes one ended with a dead superman, one who actually stayed dead this time" she hastily added when she saw Diana's disbelieving look



"well oddly enough Lois Lane didn't take too well to this, and her greiving process was a little bit different to what some might consider normal, she began comfort eating, a lot, but also she had somehow gotten hold of some lex corp tech, she became a super hero in her own right, but she was strange, in a year she'd ended most conflict in the world by fattening anyone who started conflict, she then started enforcing that lifestyle on everyone else, her theory being if everyone's fat glutted and content, no one needs to fight or kill anyone anymore and no one else has to suffer what she suffered, she surrounded herself with a harem of fat super heroines and that's how this universes justice leagues come to be what you see in front of you" she finished, stroking her vast gut for visual effect and farting as she did so,



Wonder woman still couldn't believe what she was hearing,



"even if this is all true, why tell us?"
113121112211111121.title: Selina want's to find her fat counterpart t...

choices: She orders dessert and asks Rose to eat with her
She tries to get some answers from Rose
Suddenly, a slobby gang bursts in. It's a stick up!
1131212.content:
For most of the customers Catwoman meal was a light snack but for her it was the most she's ever eaten. Leaving only a pile of dirty plates on the table, licked clean, Selina groaned as she rubbed her bloated belly. Her feast had taken a toll on her body and her outfit. Minutes into her feast, her body practically exploded with flab giving her cat suit no time to prepare for the sudden shift in weight. Her stomach tripled in size and busted the zipper in front. She propped it up on the table letting it gurgle and rumble as her food digested. Her hips doubled in width and split around her rear. Now everyone could go ahead and ogle at her sweet ass once she sits up, though currently its nearly filling out the whole booth. Her breasts were as large as her head by this point and with her attire ruined, there was little covering them up. She hoped that the indecency laws were lighter around here and that she wouldn't wind up even larger than she already was. Although she wouldn't mind another meal like this even if it did wreck her figure.

"Did you save room for dessert?" The waitress returned, smiling as she looked upon her content customer. Selina blushed a little embarrassed to be seen this way even if its by a woman larger than herself.

"I don't think I can eat BRRRRUUUUUUUUP!" Catwoman belched, surprising herself. "But thanks anyway...." She tried to look for her name tag but couldn't find it. She suspected it's probably lodged underneath her breast.

"Name's Rose. People stopped looking for it a while ago. And don't mention it. We gotta look out for another these days. Slob patrol is really cracking down on sticks." If the police officers were more like Rose she might not have minded being fed liquid garbage. Speaking of, Selina remembered the situation she is in and craved answers. Her stomach however craved more sustenance and the thief was tempted to take her up on dessert.

"Well now that you mention it, there is something I want..."
1131212.title: Skip to after Selina's meal, the food's...

choices: Go looking for Batman
Ditch her cat suit and find a disguise
Reader's Choice
11313.content:
Selina leaned against a wall panted and tried to assess the situation. Somehow she wound up in a strange city where fat is in and there were serious consequences for those that broke the law. If she had more time to plan and was still her skinny self, she would strip this city clean of all its valuables. As it stands though, she's in no condition to perform any complex acrobatics or elaborate heists. What she needed was to figure out where the heck she is and where everyone was at, heroes and villains. She was mostly concerned with Batman and Harley, the rest not so much.

Once she managed to stand up straight and find her balance, Selina joined the corpulent crowds of pedestrians pickpocketing as many people as she could while musing over her next plan of attack. No one seemed to question her attire but she would have to find some new duds in she were to blend in and avoid detection. Last thing she wanted was to be on the other end of that trash hose again. She would also need to get a layout of the city so she'd know what places she should avoid. Lastly, she needed to find a way out of this putrid hellhole. Everyone walking ahead of her was constantly breaking wind and she was unfortunate enough to be downwind of their tuna salad toots.

After snagging about $400 from various victims, she broke off from the crowd and ventured off into the city with one thing on her mind.
11313.title: Getting Her Bearings

choices: The manor desolated and destroyed
There was a lavish party being hosted
A gang of slobs have taken over
113131.content:
As much as it pained her to admit it, she needed help. If there was one person she could rely on it was Batman. It wounded her pride to have to go crawling to him for help but she had no choice. Besides, it beat staying around here and waiting to be fattened even further.

She hailed a taxi and stuffed her enlarged backside into the back. The interior was a pigsty; the seats were stained with sauces and grease, wrappers littered the floor, and the driver an obese gas bag that refused to roll down the window. So Selena had to endure her driver hotboxxing the car with flatulence. She tried to take her mind off the situation by thinking about how she would explain herself to Bruce. He's bound to ask her about her sudden weight gain. Then again, everyone was fat here so it shouldn't be that shocking.

It was a lengthy drive, and the cab driver made two stops at drive thrus to pig out om fast food. She was repulsed by her driver yet couldn't resist sneaking a couple handful of fries for herself. At first it was to get the taste of the trash she ingested earlier but then she discovered how delicious these fries were. The driver hardly noticed and since they were loudly gassing up a storm, Catwoman was able to sneak a few squeaky farts in without being noticed.

Eventually, Selena arrived at her destination with fry bits and salt staining her stretched cst suit and cleavage. Her plan was to break in and wait for Bruce to return so she could talk with him but she was surprised to find......
113131.title: Go looking for Batman

choices: Batgirl
Killer Frost
This world's slobby Catwoman
1131311.content:
To her dismay, the stately Wayne Manor was in complete disarray. The gates were left wide open so she didn't have to worry about climbing over. Though that wasn't her main concern at the moment. A flurry of questions filled her head as she broke into jog up to the front door. That proved to be a mistake as she found herself out of breath by the time she got there. It was a cool night out and she needed to cool off so she undid the zipper of her jumpsuit sighing as the breeze refreshed her pudgy body.

She stepped inside deciding to deal with her appearance later. If Batman saw her, good for him. If not, his loss. Either way the breeze felt good on her skin and her gut was now hanging loose and blocking the zipper. No way she was going to get that zipper up until she lost some weight.

Delving deeper into the mansion, Catwoman was worried about why the place had gone to pieces. If Batman was here, he clearly needed a new cleaning staff. Her stomach gurgled and the burglar appeased it by ripping a couple of farts while no one was around. As she did, she pondered what was going on. Did she travel into the future? Or go to another dimension? Is this the work of Mad Hatter or Scarecrow? All possible but it didn't explain why everyone's a slob. Or why she's still hungry.

Her foot came down and crunched an empty bag of chips. She stopped and noticed that the deeper she went, the more bags and containers she found and the more she suspedted that someone might be living here after all. She put her guard and stuck to the shadows as she continued her search.

She found herself in the ballroom and picked up the foul stench of a fart still wafting in the air. A potent, fresh one to be exact. Someone was here, and not too far away. Footsteps echoed down the hall and Catwoman leapt behind a dusty couch and waited to see who had set up shop here. To her surprise, it was...
1131311.title: The manor desolated and destroyed

choices: Try to reason with this Catwoman
Beat some sense into her
She's too strong! Selina passes out
11313113.content:
No one? She was so sure that someone had been following her. Just as she was about to let her guard down, a horrid stench reached her that was stronger than before. Suddenly, her reflexes kicked in and leapt backwards as a tremendous figure lunged from above. Selina avoided the attack just in time, and even with her heavier figure she still managed to land on her feet and live up to her feline namesake. As the dust settled, she got a good look at her attacker and gasped when she realized who it was.

Herself.

Standing before her was another Selina Kyle, only this fat cat was far larger than herself. This thief wore a jumpsuit much like her own only it was far too small for her and everything was on full display. The zipper was all the way down, no doubt to give her paunch room to breathe and cover up her waist like a doughy apron with a few creases here and there. Her breasts were a out four cup sizes bigger and bigger than her chubby head. And then there was her ass, which looked like it could fill the entire backseat of a cop car. How she managed to sneak up on her, let alone remain acrobatic with those thunder thighs was baffling.

"I should have known they'd someone after me," said the fatter Selina. "I just didn't expect a scrawny copy cat. Let's see if you're at least half as good as I am."

Before she could get a word in, this world's Catwoman pounced with astonishing speed. Selina just barely dodged the attack. She had a plethora of questions but first she had to put an end to this fight. "I'm not here to fight. I came here to-"

"Steal what hasn't been taken?" The other Selina guessed, pausing to let out a cheesy belch. "You bastards already took everything from him. First his business, then his life, and now his home?" She spun around and aimed her flabby ass at Selina, revealing a prominent blown out hole in the back of her suit, where she vented a nauseatingly fishy PPPPPPBBBBBBLLLLLLRRRRRRTTTTTT! It was almost as strong as one of Black Canary's screams and stung her nostrils. This stunned Selina long enough for the fatter cat to move in and land a flurry of slashes on her that tore her costume to shreds. The front of her leather attire was exposed much like her doughy counterpart and gained a series of a claw marks that drew blood. To make matters worse, the fat cat belched again in her face and ended her combo with a belly bash that sent her flying and slamming against the wall.

Selina fell to the floor, aching from the beatdown she just received. The hardest hit she got was the revelation that Bruce was dead. She refused to believe this was the case and wanted answers right now. She winced and struggled to get back up to her feet but her new weight made it difficult. Not to mention her head was still spinning from the gas attack, and the other Catwoman was in another weight class entirely and in her element. How was she going to get out of this?

14.content:
Original story credit goes to ryu19.

Harley slumped back against the wall while her larger companion continued on about her temporal predicament. "As you can see, this ain't exactly the same place you came from." As if to accentuate it, she reached behind her expansive rear, farted into her cupped hand, and brought it up to her nose to savor the rank scent.

"Yeah, I can see that," she sighed. "Say, where's Mister J?"

Harley's plus-sized partner got a wistful look in her eyes. "He died, I dunno, a year ago. Cherry pie overdose, doc said." She paused to sniffle, but it was stifled by a light burp. "It was rough without him, yeah, but Kitty and Red helped me get through it."

"Oh." Harley slumped down even further, her pert butt finally resting on the floor. She could already feel tears welling up in the corners of her eyes.

Hefty Harley waddled over and placed a grease-stained hand on her smaller duplicate's shoulder. "There, there, don't cry now. It was hard for me, too. You know what always helped me whenever I felt down thinking 'bout Mister J?"

"What?" Harley moaned despondently, not even bothering to raise her eyes.

"Gettin' some grub! C'mon, let's go!" And with that, she wrapped her sausage-like fingers around her companion's hand and sped (well, it was fast for her) toward the door. "There's plenty of great restaurants, what are ya in the mood for?"

Harley stumbled along, noticing that it had been a while since she last ate...
14.title: Harley Quinn

choices: They eat there all night, and Harley passes out in a food coma.
Harley acts like just as big of a pig as her big counterpart at the next course.
After the stuffing, the Harleys need to use the bathroom to make room for more.
143.content:
Original story credit goes to yyy24.

As they wandered through the streets of a city that was similar to, but not quite like, Metropolis, Harley couldn't help but gawk at the bizarro-world around her. The most obvious feature was that everyone was fat. As in, everyone was fat. Fat enough that this universe's fat version of herself was a little on the light side. Fat enough that she saw elementary school-aged kids twice her weight. Even the pets were fat; she saw someone walking a dog that was probably heavier than the kid. Everything about the city seemed to revolve around eating. Every large flat surface was plastered with posters promoting some sort of artery-wrecking fast food product, people had (very stretched-out) tattoos of their favorite chip brands like people back home would have gang signs, and every corner had some sort of restaurant, stall, or cart hawking something that inevitably had the words "triple-" and "fried" somewhere in its name. She looked up, but above her were endless spires of illuminated restaurant billboards and neon soda signs. And of course, everyone was carrying a cup, bag or wrapper of sorts, and the only time something came out of their mouths rather than going in was when they belched.

Then there were the smells. Harley wondered why her alternate self hadn't started going by the name Pennywise, considering how the entire city smelled like a sewer. Every surface people touched seemed grimy, there were puddles and stains of very questionable repute all along the sidewalk, and the air itself seemed to be filled with a foul-smelling haze. Harley wondered what it would be like to light a match in there.

She couldn't shake the feeling she was being watched, though, and she wasn't exactly wrong. Whenever she caught someone's eye, they would either stare at her like she'd grown a second head, or give her a dirty glare worthy of blood feuds and people who cut you off in traffic.

"So, uh, me, why are we going so far and passing all these other places?" Harley asked, shouting over the din of traffic and flatulence.

Her larger companion slowed down to a normal-paced waddle and let her catch up. "Oh, these places? I've eaten at every one of 'em at least half a dozen times. They're all good, but they ain't nothing special. If all these other places are blowin' your mind, wait until you see this place!" And with that, they stopped in front of a place that looked like a rather upscale establishment; black walls, silver building accents, nice mahogany doors, lines of people waiting to get in, and two bouncers with big paunches who could probably throw bigger punches.

Large Harley grabbed her and put a heavy arm over her shoulder, whispering, "Just follow my lead and keep quiet." Harley had no trouble with staying quiet, though her gag reflex was a different matter; Large Harley's armpit was right by her head, and all the leather and spandex in the world couldn't keep the odor from staying in.

Harley didn't focus on what her corpulent counterpart was doing compared to holding her breath, but somehow they got through the doors and were quickly escorted to a booth. When Harley was free of her companion's fleshy prison, she took a massive gulp of air. Big mistake. The stench of the outside was even more overpowering here, and she could hardly breathe without trying to not throw up. Big Harley, meanwhile was having the time of her life.

"What, you're gagging at this?! You can't be serious! If this is bad for you, then I'd hate to see you in my bathroom the day after One Buck Burrito night!" she snorted before launching into another fit of flatulent giggles. When it died down, she resumed talking, "I already ordered us the three-course special. Believe me, you'll love it!"

After that, the conversation died down significantly, with the silence occasionally being broken by gas escaping from one of Large Harley's ends. Thin Harley was bored out of her skull; there were no napkins to tear, silverware to throw at people, plates to spin (and promptly break), or menus to read the fine print of. The only other thing on the table was a bowl full of cake-like sugary bread rolls stewing in melted butter. Harley had stopped after a couple bites, but her fat friend had already eaten half the basket and began pouring butter into her overflowing mouth, rendering her spandex-clad front a little too transparent for Harley's tastes.

"So..." Harley said, attempting to broach the awkward silence, "how did everything get to become so, ya'know..."

"Big?" Large Harley aptly replied. "Well, I'd say it all started, I dunno, twenty or thirty years ago. I mean, when I was younger, everyone was still pretty thin. Then, I guess bein' fat just started becoming popular, then just normal. When I went into high school, I was 150 pounds. When I graduated, I was just over 200. Almost 300 when I met Mister J, and now, I'd say I'm easily past 500. I was around 400 or so for most of my life, but then..."

Harley, now engrossed in this weird world, eagerly asked "...and then what? C'mon, tell me!"

Large Harley sighed (which was cut off prematurely by a burp), "It happened. It all started when-"

Before she could say another word, a massive waitress on a motor scooter with a body like Jabba's and hair like Chewbacca's rolled up and placed two massive soup-tureens that rested on her belly up on the table. "Order up! Special, first course, two servings!" Without another word, she sped off back to the kitchens. Harley wasn't sure whether the puttering noise was from the cart or from her ass.

Harley cautiously lifted the lid off and wanted to gag. Inside was a churning pool of what looked like half-congealed fryer oil, its surface obscured with lumps of fried dough, mystery meat, and a few unidentified white globs. Once again, Large Harley saw her smaller self's reaction and had another laugh at her reaction. "What, you've never seen melted lard mixed with mayo before? That's a piece of deep-fried chocolate cake, that's some mozzarella, and the meat? I wanna say it's beef. I dunno, they change it every week."

Her fears (very slightly) assuaged, Harley nervously leaned over, filled her ladle-sized spoon, and apprehensively took a sip. Her tongue felt like it had been taken a wrong turn down an alley, got whacked by a stick of butter, and was robbed of all its tastebuds. The flavors were so powerful and overwhelming it was as if they canceled each other out, leaving only a vaguely buttery taste. A glance across the table showed her large counterpart earning her name, desperately slurping down soup and picking out floating chunks of food with her bare hands. Harley didn't want to be rude; her friend (for lack of a better word) had arranged this all, and she didn't want to make her bad or seem even more out of place than she was already. Besides, she thought, how much damage can another sip do?

...

Harley moaned in a combination of pain and ecstasy, her hands rubbing her swollen midsection. She hadn't packed away the soup like her larger self, but a good third of it was empty and all the chunks of food were picked out. She didn't necessarily want to feel like she was pregnant with triplets, but a combination of interdimensional peer pressure and a bit of actual hunger forced her to each as much as she physically could without being sick.

Harley glanced down at her swollen stomach. It only peaked out several inches, but as far as she concerned, she might as well be carrying a boulder in her belly. "Oh god," she mumbled, her eyelids fluttering a bit. "I'd say I definitely overdid it. Food wins." The ladle slipped out of her hands with a clatter and Harley closed her eyes, listening for a moment to the sounds of her larger self pouring the remaining contents of Harley's soup-tureen into her own.
143.title: Order up!

The hours eventually blended into one big gluttonous conclusion as Harley simply couldn't eat another bite, dreamily passing out as she leaned back in their booth and belching in triumph. her belly spilled out in front of her over her lap and drooped down towards the floor, her fattened thighs strained against her trousers while her significantly bigger breasts threatened to explode out of her top, the beginnings of a double chin appearing on her face.

Her fat versions own belly was bloating out in front of her as well but she hadn't exactly gained any weight to speak of, merely having had only a light snack herself. she giggled at the sight of her skinny alter ego and stroked her corpulent chins in thought as she planned what to do next.

"That's right little Harl, Just you sleep, I'm gonna take you somewhere nice and safe" Fat Harley cooed while stroking her smaller self's hair, smearing her face with greasy remnants of their meal

Waddling away from the booth Harley went to a service elevator at the back of the restaurant with the words "VIP's Only" strewn across the doors, entering her access code into the keypad she entered the lift and pressed the button that would lead her to the head honcho of this establishment and renowned play girl, Selina Kyle.

----

Thin Harley awoke softly and peacefully, her distended gut being rubbed by her fat self as she stretched out to take stock of her surroundings, they weren't in the restaurant but they weren't anywhere that she'd been previously either, a big sprawling underground station was all around her, she was she noticed on a surprisingly clean but large mattress, in the centre of a ring of vats and barrels all of which had various labels and nozzles all over them and strange scents wafting from them as well.

"Where are we?" Harley asked her fatter counterpart

"I've brought you somewhere where we can really pack some meat on those skinny little bones sugar" was the reply she got, as the floor began to shake at the approach of some hulking bulk out of the shadows behind them.

Harley was about to get up and leave when suddenly the door in front of her flew open, a gigantic rear reversing down on top of her, the owner not noticing that she wasn't sat on porcelain but rather Harley's now rather soft and plump body. Harley held her breath as best she could as the Colossal cheeks threatened to envelop her as the titanic slob that owned them settled in for what Harley couldn't even begin to think would be a pleasant experience for anyone involved. she tried to speak up but a thunderous fart drowned out her complaints and instead caused her to gag in revulsion as the stench hit her point blank, the warmth of the gas flowing over her as it left its fleshy prison.

It only got worse for Harley as something much squishier and warmer began to chunder forth and flow over her in a sickening messy wave, she managed to cope for about half a minute before the sensation and the smell caused her to pass out.

Her fatter counterpart meanwhile was still waiting in the bathroom, wondering what was taking her skinny self so long and where it was she was managing to find the rest of the energy to create such sounds and waste, having not seen the new occupier of the stall who went into it and was currently emptying their bowels onto her thinner self.

oh...you know....good Was all she could fluster back at The green blob woman as she waddled past her, the stench of her home made fertiliser wafting away behind her, waiting for the toilet door to shut behind Ivy, Harley rushed to the stall to see what had happened to her thin self only to gasp at what she saw

"ah well, not my problem" Fat Harley thought to herself, "better go find the skinny me, wonder if she's hidden in the all you can eat buffet"



As she waddled off her thinner self just lay there, wallowing in the filth that enveloped her, still unconscious from the stench she was surrounded by, it wasn't until a thunderous belch from the next stall over shook the walls of the bathroom that she jolted awake to be reminded of her situation, she began to struggle and shift around in the gigantic pile she was trapped in, eventually managing to at least break her head and arms a bit more free of the pile, she began to slowly and methodically dig and pull herself out of the tower of turd that she was quite sick of being inside of, her clothes now stained forever she swore that the first thing she would do once out of this was find herself what passed for a shower in this place and never leave it for a good year or so.



Suddenly the cubicle opened, Harley looked up and made a point to shout at the new arrival to make sure she wasn't about to be resealed in her poop prison when she saw who it was who had entered
143312122.title: She just leaves. Another fat Superheroine comes...

choices: A pair of hefty officers enter the steakhouse.
Her universe's Catwoman carrying their final course.
Batgirl... but more thinner than she remember.
14333.content:
“Whoo, I don’t know about you, but I feel lighter after that dump,” Large Harley said.

“Ugh, I feel like I just crapped out my organs.” Harley groaned, her ass still sore from relieving her feces.

“Ahh, don’t worry about it. Happens to the best of us. Took me some time before this big ol’ paunch of mine could hold its food,” Large Harley gave her flabby stomach a few good pats and shakes, showing her smaller self the result of years of gluttony. As if awakened from by its owner, her stomach emitted a deafening growl. Both Harleys watched the roaring gut jiggled through the food-strained spandex before Big Harley laughed.

“Speaking of my stomach, ‘bout time we get back to stuffing our faces.” she placed her smaller counterpart back in her bra and left the bathroom. She made it to her booth just as the massive waitress arrived with the food.

“Special, second course, two servings!” she placed the food on the table and sped away, leaving a trail of flatulence sputtering from her ass.

Large Harley was ready to scarf down her meal when she felt something squirming in her chest. “Oh right.” Reaching into her bra, she pulled out her smaller self who was gasping for air. “Sorry, guess I had food on the brain.”

Harley grabbed the table’s edge for support as she slowly walked to the other side of the booth. Her body reeked of her fatter counterpart’s horrible odor while her face glistens from the sweat of Large Harley’s breasts. “Jeez, just how heavy are those things? I was almost squished by them!”

“Yeah, if there’s one thing the girls ain’t, it’s light.” Big Harley shook her bountiful boobs. “Besides, it was the only place I could think of to keep you hidden.”

“Keep me hidden from what? Just what’s so different about your world?”

Large Harley looked around, making sure no one was listening before she spoked in a quiet manner. “Listen, I can’t say much, but it’s for your safety. The fewer people that see you, the better. When we get to my home, I’ll explain everything.”

Harley nodded but before she could ask anything else, Large Harley’s gut roared once again, breaking the tension between them. The fatter blonde of the duo grinned sheepishly and rubbed her angry belly. “But first, let’s finish eating. I’m practically wasting away here.” She handed her smaller self a plate and then proceeded to chow down.

Meanwhile, Harley stared wide-eyed at her meal: A quadruple burger loaded with bacon, onions, red and green peppers, BBQ sauce, jalapeños, and melted cheddar cheese oozing from the sides; Accompanying the burger were a side of chili fries and onion rings. Like a pillar, it towered on the plate, almost taunting the thin blonde to eat it. In midst of her eating, Large Harley noticed her smaller self’s expression.

“What, you’re not afraid of some burger, are you?” Large Harley asked playfully before she belched loudly. “Just clamp it down and bite it.” To highlight her point, she took a chomp of the burger. She smiled smugly, her lips smeared with BBQ sauce and cheese.

After watching her fat friend’s demonstration, Harley grabbed the rather intimidating burger. At least it’s more appealing than the soup… and probably just as filling too, she thought. She opened her mouth as wide as possible and bit the burger. Her tongue was met with an overwhelming spicy flavor, causing her to drop the burger and fanned her mouth.

“Whoops, forget to mention the jalapeños have a bit of a kick,” Large Harley said. “I’ll ask for some sodas for us.”

Once their drinks arrived, the Harleys resumed eating. Big Harley scarfed down her food, only pausing for a drink or expelling gas from either end. Little Harley, however, at a more reasonable pace, though the food was taking its toll on her. The burger was so thick and greasy that even chewing it became a hassle. Her distended stomach, still digesting the soup, bulged as she ate through her burger while taking sips of her heavily carbonated soda; she placed a hand on her belly as gas brewed inside it. Ooh, even in my stomach, this burger still giving me problems. It’s lucky it’s a damn good burger.

Eventually, Little Harley, belly filled and swollen with a burger, soda, and a couple of onion rings, pushed away her plate and leaned back into the booth. She cradled her bowling ball sized stomach; it might as well be a bowling ball, considering how heavy it felt on Harley’s lap as it gurgled and bubbled. She moaned before a burp escaped her lips.

“So… how was it?” Large Harley asked, taking the rest of her smaller self’s chili fries and onion rings.

“Ohhh, way… way better than the soup,” Harley said, tending to her aching food baby. “So much food. I won’t be eating anytime soon.”

“Uh, hate to burst your bubble, but there’s one more course left.”

“…Oh. Yay,” Harley replied sarcastically. Her food-filled belly gurgled loudly as she belched surprisingly loud before a fart blasted from her ass. She didn’t bother excusing herself. She was just glad she free some space in her stomach.

“Nice one.” Large Harley mockingly applauded at her smaller counterpart’s gaseous display. She giggled and reached for a handful of onion rings when she noticed…
14333.title: A Forewarning Second Course

choices: No, stick with this and go to Ivy's

New Story

145.title: Just a moment...

choices: Harley lets them take her in
Harley takes a stand and fights them
Harkey makes a break for it and runs
1452.content:
Harleen was used to having weird days. Hell, the only weird days she had were the ones that weren't weird. Take today for example, she and the Joker were planning to nuke Metropolis until the Justice League showed up. She was getting their getaway car prepped when all of a sudden there was a bright light and she was whisked away.

Now, she found herself in a strange, familiar looking city. It looked like Metropolis, only it was night time and more importantly, it lush with greenery and plant life. The sidewalks were overgrown with grass and weeds, large stalks of vines were wrapped around buildings, beautiful gardens have overtaken the rubble of buildings. All Harley could say was, "Sheesh, who turned the urban jungle into a literal one?"

Almost instantly she knew the one person that could be behind this. "This has to get to be Red's doing. Guess I should go pay her a visit." Harley headed down the sidewalk, unaware that a peculiar plant seemed to be watching her. From the looks of it Harley seemed to be in the slums of town. When she did find people, they were enormous! They had to be at least 400-500 pound. Most of them gave her an odd look before going back to their own business shuffling as fast as they could away from her. Another thing she noticed was the smell. It's like the whole city cut the cheese and never stopped ripping. Then there were the strange, foul smelling dumpsters seemingly on every corner labeled 'Manure Dropoff'.

As she stopped to assess the situation, one of the vines from a nearby streetlamp snaked down and wrapped around her pulling her up by her feet. She yelped and found herself dangling upside down. What's worse, just as she reached for the knife hidden in her boot, she could hear the familiar sirens of an approaching cop car. "Ah crap."

Hiding the knife behind her back, she watched as the cop car came to a halt. What seemed unusual to her though was that given her numerous experiences riding in the backseat of a paddywagon, this one seemed wider than usual. It soon made sense when two obese women stepped out in green uniforms. They looked more like sumo wrestlers than cops but they were eyeing Harley like they were on the beat.

"Well what do you know, they weren't kidding when they reported an actual clown running around here. Looks like you owe me dinner, Sarah."

"Yeah yeah, I know. Alright Stick, you've got some explaining to do?" Sarah said.

If anyone needed an explanation, it was Harley. What happened to the city? Why were these lardasses so fat? Where was her Puddin? She had a feeling they wouldn't tell her if she asked nicely. Still clutching her knife, she considered cutting herself loose and beating the answers out of these pigs or making a break for it. Or she could let them take her in and go to the source. Knowing Joker, he'd break her out the moment he found out someone took his favorite gal.
1452.title: A Strange, Green World

choices: Harley heads to Joker's (now abandoned) hideout.
Harley gets a craving for donuts
Harley gets word of a crime in progress and checks it out
14522.content:
Then it occurred to Harley that her Puddin' might be upset that he had to save her once again so she decided to handle this matter on her own. She got to work cutting the vines holding her up and stalled the cops for now. "Okay officers, ya got me. Please be gentle. I don't think my teeny tiny body is a match for your big, mighty bodies." She said in the meakest voice she could muster.

"Damn right! I bet you'd snap like a twig under my ass." The one called Sarah said. "Maybe we should find out~"

"Go easy on the kid. She probably got roped into one of those Stick gangs or something." The other cop mentioned. "Besides, the chief told you we can't do that no more."

"Ah come on Lena, we haven't had a perp to bust in weeks! Just let me have a little fun."

Right as she said that, Harley finished slicing through the vines and dropped down. She grabbed the cut vine and used it to swing over like Tarzan and kick Sarah in the face. The cop staggered back as Harley released her grip and went after the other cop. The clown used her face as a dismount and backflipped onto the ground. While Sarah recovered from the kick, Harley sweeped her leg and sent the blob falling face first.

Just then, Lena pulled out her tazer and charged at the second banana. She thrust her arm out but Harley sidestepped her and landed a couple punches on her. Due to her bulking physique, the flab absorbed much of the force. Lena was pissed now as Sarah struggled to push herself back up. Harley backflipped onto the top of the car and hopped onto the other side, forcing Lena to chase after her. Seeing as her partner wasn't getting up anytime soon, Harley started cartwheeling just out of reach and let the cop chase after her until she tired herself out.

It only took a minute to reduce Lena to a sweating, panting mess. Making it all the more easier for Harley to sock her in the face and have her fall on her ass right on top of Sarah with an OOF! Her tazer clattered on the ground and Harley picked it up. As the two cops groaned, Harley stood over them grinning like a madwoman. "Night night, ladies."

She then zapped the two at full power, knocking the cops out. She then turned off the tazer and blew some smoke off it as if it were a gun. She pocketed it for now and reveled in her victory, doing a little dance for no one in particular. But then she remembered that she still had no clue what was going on and that these two were out of commission, she couldn't ask them squat. "Doh! Good one Harleen. Now what am I supposed to do?"

It was then she realized that the cop car was still unlocked and the keys still in the ignition. "Maybe this wasn't a total loss after all..." As the cogs in her head started spinning, she stripped the officers of their clothes and valuables, leaving them in their bra and panties. As tempted as she was to leave them, even she wasn't so cruel as to leave these unconscious girls alone in this part of town. Besides, she still needed answers.

So she slowly lugged the two into the back of the car, grunting as she looped her arms under theirs and put them in the back. Seeing their ample endowments did make her feel a little self-conscious though but she told herself that at least she still had her figure. Once Sarah and Lena were stuffed in the back, Harley got into the driver's seat and noticed an open box of donuts. Feeling a but peckish, she helped herself to one and revved up the car. She drove off into the city, turning on the police radio to hear if there was any word about the Joker.

As she entered the livelier sections of town, she noticed that everyone had put on some pounds. There wasn't a single person that was under 400 pounds and every single face was chowimg dowm on something. Everything seemed focused on obesity and getting bigger. Another thing she noticed was the abundance of plant life and greenery. The urban jungle looked like an actual jungle, with vines and flowers covering every building. Harley had a feeling this was Ivy's doing but there was still a lot of gaps to fill. Speaking of gaps, when she reached into the donut box she got nothing but air. Apparently she had eaten the entire box clean. Resulting in a tiny but noticeable belly bump covered in crumbs.

Harley needed answers right away before she wound up like everyone else. She had to do something other than drive around town.
